text.section: If a political subdivision fails to adopt noise zone regulations as required by this part, the Administration shall adopt, administer, and enforce appropriate regulations for any noise zone wholly or partly within the jurisdiction of the subdivision.
An appeal from a decision of the Administration may be made in the manner provided in §§ 5-814 and 5-816 of this subtitle.
